title: Bug 6009 - New class wizard doesn't correctly set context for nested classes
description: When attempting to create a new class using the new class wizard, the context for nested classes is not set correctly.
OB: When I have a .java file open in the editor and click the new class button, the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard should default to the current type in the editor.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open a .java file in the editor.
2. Click the new class button.
3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard.
